languages.text: "Ты — тот человек, что может это остановить. И Номос обязаны тебе помочь. Мы — неизвестная тварь, рожденная из случайности. Но мы хотим оправдать свое существование, служа свету".
"You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from chance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."
languages.original_text: "Ты — тот человек, что может это остановить. И Номос обязаны тебе помочь. Мы — неизвестная тварь, рожденная из случайности. Но мы хотим оправдать свое существование, служа свету".

traits.locale_text: "You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from happenstance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."
"You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from happenstance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."
"You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from chance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."
"You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from chance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."
"You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from chance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."

languages.text: 「それを止められるのはあなた。そしてノモスはあなたを助けなくてはならない。我々は偶然生み出された正体不明の物体。けれど我々は光に仕え、我々の存在が正当なものであると証明したい」
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from chance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."

traits.locale_text: 「それを止められるのはあなた。そしてノモスはあなたを助けなくてはならない。我々は偶然生み出された正体不明の物体。けれど我々は光に仕え、我々の存在が正当なものであると証明したい」

languages.text: “你是唯一能阻止它的人，诺莫斯必须帮助你。我们是偶然诞生的未知之物，但我们想通过侍奉光明来证明我们的存在价值。”
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from chance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."

traits.locale_text: “你是唯一能阻止它的人，诺莫斯必须帮助你。我们是偶然诞生的未知之物，但我们想通过侍奉光明来证明我们的存在价值。”

languages.text: "Ihr könnt es aufhalten. Und Nomos muss Euch helfen. Wir sind ein unidentifiziertes Ding, das aus dem Zufall geboren wurde. Doch wir wollen unsere Existenz rechtfertigen, indem wir dem Licht dienen."
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from chance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt es aufhalten. Und Nomos muss Euch helfen. Wir sind ein unidentifiziertes Ding, das aus dem Zufall geboren wurde. Doch wir wollen unsere Existenz rechtfertigen, indem wir dem Licht dienen."

languages.text: « Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez enrayer cette spirale et nous devons vous aider. Nous sommes une entité non identifiée née du hasard, mais nous voulons légitimer notre existence en servant la lumière. »
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from chance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."

traits.locale_text: « Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez enrayer cette spirale et nous devons vous aider. Nous sommes une entité non identifiée née du hasard, mais nous voulons légitimer notre existence en servant la lumière. »

languages.text: «Usted es {mf|el único|la única} que puede evitarlo. Y Nomos debemos ayudarle. Somos un ser indefinido nacido del azar. Pero deseamos justificar nuestra existencia sirviendo a la luz».
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from chance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."

traits.locale_text: «Usted es {mf|el único|la única} que puede evitarlo. Y Nomos debemos ayudarle. Somos un ser indefinido nacido del azar. Pero deseamos justificar nuestra existencia sirviendo a la luz».

languages.text: "Bunu durdurabilecek tek kişi sizsiniz. Nomos da size yardım etmek zorunda. Şans eseri var olmuş, tanımlanmamış bir varlığız. Ancak ışığa hizmet ederek varoluşumuzu meşru kılmak istiyoruz."
languages.original_text: "You are the one who can stop it. And Nomos must help you. We are an unidentified thing spawned from chance. But we want to justify our existence by serving the light."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu durdurabilecek tek kişi sizsiniz. Nomos da size yardım etmek zorunda. Şans eseri var olmuş, tanımlanmamış bir varlığız. Ancak ışığa hizmet ederek varoluşumuzu meşru kılmak istiyoruz."
